entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 this morning then rising. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow at times. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 20 this morning then rising. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 30%
